snippet: The new year brings a wide range of brand-new albums from Texas recording artists, including Reverend Horton Heat returning to punk-infused rockabilly, Ray Benson going eclectic and Los Lonely Boys sounding like the Beatles.
lead_paragraph: The new year brings a wide range of brand-new albums from Texas recording artists, including Reverend Horton Heat returning to punk-infused rockabilly, Ray Benson going eclectic and Los Lonely Boys sounding like the Beatles.

headline.main: Tunes for the New Year From the Home Team
headline.print_headline: Tunes for the New Year From the Home Team
